page.title: 04MINING, PARK MILL 3.
page.content: {MACHINES}NOW CUT AND LOAD COAL ON TO STEEL CONVEYORS. SOME MACHINES ARE AS STRONG AS 500 HORSES AND SOME ARE CONTROLLED BY COMPUTERS. THE MINER DOESN'T HAVE TO DIG COAL OUT HE HAS TO BUILD UP THE MACHINES AND WATCH TO MAKE SURE THEY OPERATE. GIRLS CANNOT WORK DOWN A MINE AND MALES HAVE TO BE 16 YEARS OLD. COAL MINERS STILL GET DIRTY BUT NOW HE HAS A LOVELY HOT{SHOWER}AT THE PIT HEAD BATHS AND GOES HOME AS CLEAN AS A SCHOOL TEACHER, EVEN HIS BACK! {I AM A SAFETY INSPECTOR.}I HAVE TO GET UP AT 3.30 A.M.TO GO DOWN THE PIT BEFORE ALL THE WORKMEN AND MAKE SURE THAT IT IS SAFE. AIR IS CIRCULATED ROUND THE MINE USING A HUGE FAN. I HAVE TO MAKE SURE THAT THERE IS NO GAS LEFT IN THE MINE.{METHANE GAS},WHICH IS GIVEN OFF COAL, IS VERY DANGEROUS.
